markdownRemark.html:
Lv 2. 행렬의 곱셈

문제

풀이

function solution(arr1, arr2) {
    const newArr = [];

    for(let i = 0; i < arr1.length; i++) {
        let result = [];
        for(let j = 0; j < arr2[0].length; j++) {
            let elem = 0;
            for(let k = 0; k < arr2.length; k++) { 
                elem += arr1[i][k] * arr2[k][j];
            }
            result.push(elem);
        }
        newArr.push(result);
    }
    return newArr;
}```
